languages.text: Барк от Капитана, стадия абордажа 3, барк 2.

traits.locale_text: Барк от Капитана, стадия абордажа 3, барк 2.

languages.text: "Но даже не думайте, что я или "Бессердечный" вам достанутся! У капитана с кораблем всегда одна судьба, всегда..."
"But don't even think you'll be getting either me or the Heartless! A captain and his ship always share the same fate. Always..."
languages.original_text: "Но даже не думайте, что я или "Бессердечный" вам достанутся! У капитана с кораблем всегда одна судьба, всегда..."

traits.locale_text: "But don't even think you will get me or the Heartless! A captain and his ship always share the same fate. Always..."
"But don't even think you will get me or the Heartless! A captain and his ship always share the same fate. Always..."
"But don't even think you'll be getting either me or the Heartless! A captain and his ship always share the same fate. Always..."
"But don't even think you'll be getting either me or the Heartless! A captain and his ship always share the same fate. Always..."
"But don't even think you'll be getting either me or the Heartless! A captain and his ship always share the same fate. Always..."
"But don't even think you'll be getting either me or the Heartless! A captain and his ship always share the same fate. Always..."

languages.text: "Aber denkt nicht mal dran, dass Ihr mich oder die Heartless bekommt! Ein Kapitän und sein Schiff teilen immer dasselbe Schicksal. Immer ..."
languages.original_text: "But don't even think you'll be getting either me or the Heartless! A captain and his ship always share the same fate. Always..."

traits.locale_text: "Aber denkt nicht mal dran, dass Ihr mich oder die Heartless bekommt! Ein Kapitän und sein Schiff teilen immer dasselbe Schicksal. Immer ..."

languages.text: « Mais n'allez pas vous imaginer que vous réussirez à me capturer ou vous emparer du Sans-Cœur ! Un capitaine et son vaisseau partagent toujours le même sort. Toujours... »
languages.original_text: "But don't even think you'll be getting either me or the Heartless! A captain and his ship always share the same fate. Always..."

traits.locale_text: « Mais n'allez pas vous imaginer que vous réussirez à me capturer ou vous emparer du Sans-Cœur ! Un capitaine et son vaisseau partagent toujours le même sort. Toujours... »

languages.text: «¡Pero si creéis que vais a capturarnos a mí o a la Desalmada, vais dados! Un capitán siempre se hunde con su navío. Siempre...».
languages.original_text: "But don't even think you'll be getting either me or the Heartless! A captain and his ship always share the same fate. Always..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Pero si creéis que vais a capturarnos a mí o a la Desalmada, vais dados! Un capitán siempre se hunde con su navío. Siempre...».

languages.text: “不过，别以为我或者无心号会落在你们手上！真正的船长永远都会和他的船生死与共，永远都会……”
languages.original_text: "But don't even think you'll be getting either me or the Heartless! A captain and his ship always share the same fate. Always..."

traits.locale_text: “不过，别以为我或者无心号会落在你们手上！真正的船长永远都会和他的船生死与共，永远都会……”

languages.text: 「だがな、私もハートレスも、お前の思い通りにはならないぞ！船長と船は、常に運命を共にするものだ。いつだって…」
languages.original_text: "But don't even think you'll be getting either me or the Heartless! A captain and his ship always share the same fate. Always..."

traits.locale_text: 「だがな、私もハートレスも、お前の思い通りにはならないぞ！船長と船は、常に運命を共にするものだ。いつだって…」

languages.text: "Beni ya da Taşkalp'i ele geçirebileceğinizi sanıyorsanız çok yanılıyorsanız! Kaptanın kaderi gemisiyle birdir. Daima..."
languages.original_text: "But don't even think you'll be getting either me or the Heartless! A captain and his ship always share the same fate. Always..."

traits.locale_text: "Beni ya da Taşkalp'i ele geçirebileceğinizi sanıyorsanız çok yanılıyorsanız! Kaptanın kaderi gemisiyle birdir. Daima..."
